created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Tony Lambert), oscd.community
name: Bypass UAC via Fodhelper.exe
description: Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes.
false_positives: Legitimate use of fodhelper.exe utility by legitimate user
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.parent.executable:*\\fodhelper.exe`
